title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 760.11 - Establishment of not-for-profit corporations
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 760.11 - Establishment of not-for-profit corporations

State Regulations
A not-for-profit corporation seeking the approval of the

Public Health Council as the operator of a certified home health agency shall
provide, in addition to meeting the other applicable requirements of this Part, information, documents and data as follows: (a) a photocopy of the executed existing or
proposed applicable corporated certificate which shall in all respects conform
to the applicable provisions of the New York State Not-for-Profit Corporation

Law and which includes corporate powers and purposes adequate to encompass the
ownership and operation of a home care services agency or agencies; and
(b) such additional pertinent
information or documents necessary for Public Health Council consideration, as
requested. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
760.11

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
